additionalDescription: The majority of annotated files have only one annotation, some have several. Part of the BEANS benchmark
annotationsType: Individual, their behaviour, and the context
captureDevice: Chambers with microphone Avisoft-Bioacoustics Knowles FG-O
citeAs: Prat, Yosef; Taub, Mor; Pratt, Ester; Yovel, Yossi (2017). An annotated dataset of Egyptian fruit bat vocalizations across varying contexts and during vocal ontogeny. figshare. Collection. https://doi.org/10.6084/m9.figshare.c.3666502.v2
description:
An annotated dataset of Egyptian fruit bat (Rousettus aegyptiacus)
vocalizations across varying contexts and during vocal ontogeny
name: Egyptian fruit bats
numClasses: Depends on what we want to predict
recordingPeriod: From May 2012 to June 2013, and February 2014
